thread.section_title: LaserAway Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LaserAway | www.laseraway.com
thread.title: yogi B

author: yogi B
title: yogi B
text: it is conveniently located and facilities are decent. Have encountered a couple of if different receptionists and about 5 different technicians. One of the earlier receptionists was very rude. current seems nice. Of the 6 technicians, a couple were awesome, one was terrible and clearly didnt care and i dont remember the others. Depending on the staff your experience can be great or crappy....
